name: Module2-solution
body:
This is my first paragraph. It's alright, but there is probably still room for improvement.

This is my second paragraph. It is a little bit better, but it's still just alright. This paragraph is awesome. It is the best paragraph in the history of paragraphs. I'd give it a 5/7.

p {color: blue;} @media (min-width: 992px) { #p1 { width: 80%; } #p2 { width: 80%; } #p3 { width: 80%; } } @media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 991px) { #p1 { width: 50%; } #p2 { width: 50%; } #p3 { width: 50%; } } @media (max-width: 767px) { #p1 { width: 25%; } #p2 { width: 25%; } #p3 { width: 25%; } }
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
